net.myorb.math

Interface Polynomial.PowerFunction<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of component values on which operations are to be executed
    All Superinterfaces:
    net.myorb.data.abstractions.Function<T>, net.myorb.data.abstractions.ManagedSpace<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Regression.Model<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolynomialFunctionWrapper, PolynomialOptimizer.ChebyshevSegment, PolynomialOptimizer.OrdinarySegment
    Enclosing class:
    Polynomial<T>

    public static interface Polynomial.PowerFunction<T>
extends Function<T>
    a polynomial function is described with a set of coefficients
